title: Match, Start!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Today is our 3-player game tournament! I’m not going to lose~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>We made this game, after all, so I’m well prepared!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I have no intention to lose either. Rina-chan’s board「On Fire」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>So far, it’s 10 wins for each of us.... It’s pretty balanced, huh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I didn’t expect such a close game....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I have developed further measures after watching you two.... From now on, I’m not going to lose! But I feel a little hungry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Me too, actually....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I have some manjuu I bought at Honoka’s store. Should we have a tea break?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I want to eat manjuu. Rina-chan’s board「Sparkle」. We’ll put the tournament on hold then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
